channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Displaced drain cover, 6th September
item.description:
Just spotted a displaced drain cover near Prestbury Park
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overhanging brambles, 6th September
item.description:
These brambles have been causing an issue with anyone walking past and especially young children. I have reported them to TBC twice now and nothing gets done.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 43 The Highgrove, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blind spot onto busy road, 6th September
item.description:
When exiting Vale Road onto Gotherington Lane it is impossible to see what is coming from the right - often at high speed. This is due to a hedge that impedes the view.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): White House Gotherington Lane, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown brambles etc, 6th September
item.description:
This footpath is overgrown with brambles and stinging nettles making it impossible to take children on walk
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Part Parcel 6460 Bushcombe Lane, Woodmancote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bush/hedge overgrown, 6th September
item.description:
Bush/hedge obstructing lane when entering from Station Road. Has been like it a long time and is dangerous as cars swerve to avoid it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 14 Crowfield, Woodmancote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous large potholes, 6th September
item.description:
These potholes have been in existence for over 6 months without any signs of repair. They are on a major cycling route so pose many dangers for cyclists using the road for exercise.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Withington
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Pothole in middle of the road outside Duoro Court.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Douro Villa Douro Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Dangerous footpath, 6th September

Missing glass in manhole cover

item.title: Road has no road name sign, 6th September
item.description:
This is little grebe road but nobody who visits can see this as there is no road name sign on the road. Little grebe road is only signed around the corner. Really frustrating as the road has been completed for 6years at leastâ€¦
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Little Grebe Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown hedges and grass verges, 5th September
item.description:
The footpath from the racecourse to the traffic lights at GE is dangerously narrow due to overgrown hedges and grass verges. A pedestrian could easily be knocked into the road by the backdraft of a passing bus or lorry.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Hyde Lodge Evesham Road, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hedgerows desperately needing to be cut back., 5th September
item.description:
Hedgerows and shrubbery causing a hazard to pedestrians especially the elderly and young mums with young children, brambles danger to eyes and stinging nettles. In places these have taken over half of the pavement and in some cases causing pedestrians to walk in road, which is dangerous with fast moving traffic. Cheltenham Road Bishops Cleeve.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 63 Furlong Lane, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Brambles overhanging narrow path on busy roadside, 5th September
item.description:
The brambles are overhanging on a very narrow path on the brow of the hill so you canâ€™t go into the road to go around them, heavy traffic on this road going fast so you have to duck under as best you can but they are thorny.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Evesham Road, Prestbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken paths, 5th September
item.description:
Really bad broken slabs on Bibury road.someone is likely to get hurt

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 43 Benhall Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Unsafe path in Brizen, 5th September
item.description:
Large/deep cracks in path that goes around Brizen park. Itâ€™s very unsafe for small children on bikes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 31 Salix Court, Up Hatherley
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Seriously overgrown hedging, 5th September
item.description:
The hedges by the northbound pavement of the A435 Bishops Cleeve bypass (between the Stoke Road junction and Hayfield Way) are badly overgrown, with long thorny brambles hanging down at face level. This is a serious hazard for everyone, particularly those with visual impairments who could easily find themselves being badly injured. As such this should be rectified as a priority.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cranmere Stoke Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Upturned paving slab, 5th September
item.description:
Paving slab is likely to causing tripping. also pavement 1/2 normal width as hedge is leaving over

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 47 Byron Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bottles of urine, 4th September
item.description:
Walk through from Penrith Road to Grasmere Road has what looks like 3/4 large bottles of urine dumped. They have now been there for two weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 6 Grasmere Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
